param.name: system.dest.dir
param.spec: text description='Directory where composer.json is located (if empty - current working directory will be used)' display='normal' label='Composer.json directory:' validationMode='any'

param.name: system.composer.command
param.spec: text description='Composer command (install/update)' display='normal' label='Composer command:' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: system.composer.params
param.spec: text description='Optional composer.phar parameters' display='normal' label='Composer parameters:' validationMode='any'

parameters.param:
<project name="Run Composer">
<condition property="composer.dest.dir" value="${teamcity.build.workingDir}"> <not> <matches pattern=".+" string="${dest.dir}"/> </not> </condition> <property name="composer.dest.dir" value="${dest.dir}" /> <property name="composer.params" value="" />
<target name="runComposer" depends="getComposer"> <exec executable="php" failonerror="true"> <arg line="-f "${composer.dest.dir}/composer.phar" -d "${composer.dest.dir}" ${composer.params} ${composer.command}"/> </exec> </target>
<target name="getComposer" depends="create-composer-dest-dir"> <get src="http://getcomposer.org/composer.phar" dest="${composer.dest.dir}" verbose="on" skipexisting="false"/> </target>
<target name="create-composer-dest-dir"> <mkdir dir="${composer.dest.dir}"/> </target>
</project>
